passages.text:
Get to the end of the map to claim your reward!

[[Play-> First encounter]]
passages.name: Level Start

passages.text:
Your first enemy is barreling towards you with great speed, how do you fight it?

[[Go Over->Jump]]
[[Double Down->Go Faster]]
passages.name: First encounter

passages.text:
You've made it past the first foe! Above you is a set of blocks, choose wisely... 


[[Left-> ?]]
[[Right-> ??]]
[[Center-> ???]]
passages.name: Jump

passages.text:
The enemy won, try something else and restart.

[[Go Back->Level Start]]
passages.name: Go Faster

passages.text:
A Coin! With this you can do nothing! With your new found wisdom of currencey, you look to battle more foes. And one approaches from the top of a small hill, what will you do?

[[Wait and jump-> Wait]] 
[[Go for it-> It]]

A Coin! With this you can do nothing! With your new found wisdom of currencey, you look to battle more foes. And one approaches from the top of a small hill, what will you do?

[[Wait and jump-> Wait]] 
[[Go for it-> It]]

A Coin! With this you can do nothing! With your new found wisdom of currencey, you look to battle more foes. And one approaches from the top of a small hill, what will you do?

[[Wait and jump-> Wait]] 
[[Go for it-> It]]

*Bloop* you evade the enemies attack, climb the hill and see what is in store for you next...

[[Climb->Hill]]
passages.name: Wait

passages.text:
Didn't you know the high ground always wins? Anyways restart and try again, maybe you'll find something else in the block this time...

[[Restart->Level Start]]
passages.name: It

passages.text:
As you reach the top of the hill, you see what looks like a castle and flag pole, guarded by a trio of enemies. You also find a set of blocks you can use as a bridge. How will you escape the level?

[[Risk it-> Bridge]] 
[[Try your luck-> Enemies]]
passages.name: Hill

passages.text:
You miss the final jump to the flag, so close...

[[Restart->Level Start]]
passages.name: Bridge

passages.text:
Jump Jump Jump. You make it over the three enmemies in one fell swoop, go for the Goal!

[[Goal->!!!]]
passages.name: Enemies

passages.text:
CONGRATS!! You've beaten the game! Want to try again? Maybe the blocks have something else in store for you...

[[Restart->Level Start]]
